label: 合口造
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: A flush-fitting lid or scabbard closing where the sides of the lid and of the body fit together to form a single flat surface. Rimming the juncture with metal strips began in the Heian Period, and is not seen in the Nara Period.
